cards.name: Old Scroll
cards.description:
Move the 2 (3) most recent cards from your discard pile into your hand.
Exhaust.
cards.flavor:
"Ajanoputo kad ib ed'c desa du cmys huf Fa kud y naym zys kueh' tufh Famlusa du dra Cbyla Zys"

It seems to refer to the Age of Legends, but is written in a dead language, so it will take some time to translate.

cards.name: Mysterious Broom
cards.description:
Exhaust up to X cards in your hand.
If X is 4 (3) or more, take an extra turn after this one and Exhaust this.
cards.flavor: It can be used for normal cleaning, of course, but it is also said that if you use its hidden ability to store mana, it will allow you to fly when you straddle it.

cards.name: Old Magic Tome

professor:Masterwork a card and Upgrade it 3 (4) times for the rest of combat.
Exhaust.
cards.flavor: Even those who have no magic abilities can feel the mana coursing through it.

cards.name: Philosopher's Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
You may play a card you do not have the Energy for once per turn.
cards.flavor: It pulses with a vast amount of energy, but isn't stable. As such, it's quite difficult to handle.

cards.name: Requiem Flower

Choose an Attack or Power you have played. Add a copy of it into your hand.
Exhaust.
cards.flavor: Its faint bluish-white blossom is said to console the dead.

relics.name: Memoria Bracelet
relics.description: At the start of each combat, professor:Infuse "Deal 5 damage" into a random card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: The bracelet made as a symbol of affection. It was designed with fashion in mind more than practical use.

relics.name: Uni Charm
relics.description: The first time you are attacked each combat, deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: People always comment how creepily real it looks, which makes sense because it's made with an actual Uni.

relics.name: Focus Glass
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, your next Attack deals 50% more damage.
relics.flavorText: Wearing these will reveal enemy weaknesses. The design is not very good, making them somewhat difficult to use.

relics.name: Baron's Crown
relics.description: On pickup, choose a card. professor:Masterwork it and Upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: Wearing this crown will make anyone look more important.

relics.name: Locket of Devotion
relics.description: Replaces Memoria Bracelet. At the start of each turn, professor:Infuse "Deal 5 damage" into a random card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: If you place a photo of someone you want to protect inside, it will allow you to shoulder their hardships.

potions.name: Taboo Potion
potions.description: Enemy deals 8 less damage with Attacks this turn

potions.name: Limit Breaker
potions.description: Masterwork and Upgrade all cards in your hand.

keywords.name: Elements
keywords.description: Fire [Professor:FireIcon] , Ice [Professor:IceIcon] , Bolt [Professor:BoltIcon] , and Wind [Professor:WindIcon] .

keywords.name: Bomb
keywords.description:
Deals both single target and multi target damage.
Scales with [Professor:FireIcon] and [Professor:BoltIcon] .

keywords.name: Braced
keywords.description: Your next Block gaining card gains additional Block.

keywords.name: Burn
keywords.description: Burning creatures take damage at the start of their turn.

keywords.name: Catalyst
keywords.description: When added to Synthesis, trigger an extra effect.

keywords.name: Crystal Ice Bomb
keywords.description:
Deals multi target damage and applies Weak.
Scales with [Professor:IceIcon] and [Professor:WindIcon] .

keywords.name: Dark Night Treasure
keywords.description:
Kills all enemies below a certain HP.
Scales with [Professor:IceIcon] .

keywords.name: Dawn Grimoire
keywords.description:
Deals multi target damage and heals.
Scales with [Professor:FireIcon] and [Professor:BoltIcon] .

keywords.name: Unstable
keywords.description: Unstable creatures take more damage from Attacks. Each turn, Unstable is reduced by 1.

keywords.name: Elysium Harp
keywords.description:
Grants Block when entering your hand.
Scales with [Professor:WindIcon] .

keywords.name: Explosive Uni
keywords.description:
Synthesis Benefits:
Deals +2 damage per [Professor:FireIcon] .
Apply +1 Stagger per [Professor:IceIcon] .

keywords.name: Exposed
keywords.description: Exposed creatures take more damage from Attacks this turn.

keywords.name: Gather
keywords.description: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add into your hand.

keywords.name: Infuse
keywords.description: Add an extra effect onto a card this combat.

keywords.name: Laute Plajig
keywords.description:
Deals damage related to cards in hand.
Scales with [Professor:BoltIcon] .

keywords.name: Luft
keywords.description:
Draws and Upgrades cards.
Scales with [Professor:WindIcon] .

keywords.name: Masterpiece
keywords.description: A Masterpiece can be upgraded any number of times.

keywords.name: N/A
keywords.description:
Deals multi target damage.
Costs 1 less for each Element you add 2 or more of.

keywords.name: Neutralizer
keywords.description: Neutralizers are 0 cost cards which do not consume Valency during Synthesis.

keywords.name: Spectrumize
keywords.description: A Spectrumized card is Exhausted and is replaced with Neutralizers matching its Elements.

keywords.name: Phased
keywords.description: Phased creatures take more damage from Attacks.

keywords.name: Precipitate
keywords.description: If this card is used to perform Synthesis, add the following card to your hand.

keywords.name: Reactant
keywords.description: When added to Synthesis, draw a card.

keywords.name: Staggered
keywords.description: Staggered creatures deal less damage with Attacks this turn.

keywords.name: Synthesis
keywords.description: Remove X cards from your hand, contributing their Elements towards Transforming this card. Next turn, add the transformed card into your hand and discard the chosen cards.

keywords.name: Thorny Embrace
keywords.description:
Deals damage to enemies that intend to attack.
Scales with [Professor:WindIcon] .

keywords.name: Unlock
keywords.description: Unlocked cards can be upgraded any number of times.

keywords.name: Valency
keywords.description: The number of cards you must contribute to Synthesis.

mods.name: The Professor
mods.description: A new mod to play around with
